attributes.action: give equal rights to all homeless men and fathers , and not just people on rehabilatation schemes or probation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To give all single men equal rights for housing and stop the higher priority given to the immigrants the drug addicts and the ex convicts and probation service as this is a biased and unfair system. we have paid taxes for years . why should the people that have done wrong be put ahead of us . we want equal rights
